sections.title: 🔑 How to Reset Your Password
sections.content:
If you forgot your password, go to the login screen and click Forgot Password. You will receive an email with instructions.

Make sure to check your spam/junk folder if you don’t see it within a few minutes.

sections.title: 🧑‍💻 Login via Google or Facebook
sections.content:
On the login page, click the Continue with Google or Continue with Facebook button. Make sure you’re signed in to the correct Google/Facebook account.

If your social account isn't linked yet, the system may ask you to verify or create a password to link accounts.

sections.title: ⚠️ Common Login Issues
sections.content:
• Incorrect email or password
  • Social login mismatch
  • Account suspended or flagged

If none of these solve your issue, contact our support team.

sections.title: 🛡️ Tips for Keeping Your Account Secure
sections.content:
• Use a strong password with letters, numbers, and symbols
  • Do not share your login credentials
  • Enable two-factor authentication if available
